item.title: A Monk's Reflections on Auspicious Fridays, Daily Rituals, and Simple Life
item.description: Today is Friday, and Fridays are considered to be an auspicious day in our tradition. This morning, I woke up at 6 am, brushed my teeth and freshened up as usual. After that, I offered water and incense to Lord Buddha and my root Guru, and prayed for all sentient beings who are alive in this beautiful world. Then, I sat on my bed with folded legs and assumed a vertical body position.
